section.heading: Sanctions.
section.text: If any party refuses to submit to a test the party may be punished by contempt or by other sanctions that the court considers appropriate.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Section 28(c)(7) of D.C. Law 15-354 provided that the section designation of § 16-2343.2 of the District of Columbia Official Code is redesignated as § 16-2343.02.
